name.japanese: パンクハザード - 燃える土地

description: The burning half of Punk Hazard, an island that became split into fiery and frozen halves after Aokiji and Akainu's battle for the Fleet Admiral position. This region is characterized by intense heat, flames, and volcanic activity.

keyEvents.title: Battle Against Dragon Number Thirteen
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Zoro, Robin, and Usopp engage in combat with Dragon Number Thirteen in the intense heat of the Burning Lands.
keyEvents.significance: First major battle location on Punk Hazard, showcasing the dangerous environment.

keyEvents.title: Dragon Number Thirteen Defeated
keyEvents.description: Zoro decapitates Dragon Number Thirteen, ending the battle in the Burning Lands.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the Straw Hats' first victory on Punk Hazard.

statusHistory.reason: The Burning Lands continue to burn from the volcanic activity caused by Akainu's powers during his battle with Aokiji.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' second ship, built by Franky and the Galley-La Company. A brigantine-rigged sloop with a lion figurehead that can perform the Coup de Burst.

keyEvents.title: Sleeping Gas Attack
keyEvents.description: The Thousand Sunny is filled with sleeping gas, causing the crew members aboard to fall unconscious.
keyEvents.significance: Beginning of the kidnapping subplot that separates the Straw Hat crew.

keyEvents.title: Crew Members Captured
keyEvents.description: Hazmat-suited figures board the Thousand Sunny and capture Sanji, Nami, Chopper, and Franky, leaving Brook behind.
keyEvents.significance: The ship becomes compromised, forcing the crew into a dangerous situation.

statusHistory.reason: The Thousand Sunny remains the Straw Hat Pirates' ship.
